definition: worldly affairs/the ways of the world

sentences.english: A cheerful mood unties all knots, and you will see blossoms in small dots.
sentences.chinese: 心情开朗世情好，点点颜色都是花。

sentences.english: George dazzled her with his knowledge of the world.
sentences.chinese: 乔治的洞察世情令她叹服。

sentences.english: Awakening Marriage is a novel with about 100 chapters at the end of Ming Dynasty and at the beginning of Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 《醒世姻缘传》是明末清初百回长篇白话世情小说。

definition: affairs of life/things of the world
worldly wisdom/the ways of the world/to know how to get on in the world
the ways of the world/social behavior
the world of mortals (Buddhism)/human society/worldly affairs
to engage with secular society/to involve oneself in human affairs/to join the WTO (abbr. for 加入世界貿易組織|加入世界贸易组织[jia1 ru4 Shi4 jie4 Mao4 yi4 Zu3 zhi1])
variable/changeable/fickle/impermanence (Sanskrit: anitya)/ghost taking away the soul after death/to pass away/to die
joys and sorrows/partings and reunions/the vicissitudes of life
